Prerequisite(s): Two Leaden Hyena Maneuvers
Range: Melee or Ranged
Target: One creature
Duration: 1 round (see text)

Description

Tearing through your opponent with untamed voracity and sadism, you hammer out a rhythm that continually weakens their resolve. Make a full attack against the target, with each successful strike forcing them to make a Will save (DC 16 + your initiation modifier) or be shaken for 1 round. These penalties stack on top of each other, evolving to frightened and panicked as normal. If a target is already panicked, any failed Will save extends the duration of panicked by 1 round.
